products.name: TEST PRODuCT
products.description: A masterpiece of 3D design, the Ethereal Swirl Vase embodies the perfect fusion of art and function. Its mesmerizing patterns seem to dance in the light, creating a focal point in any space.

products.name: Custom Engraved Pendant
products.description: A beautiful pendant that can be customized with your personal message or design. Made from high-quality materials for a lasting keepsake.

products.name: Handcrafted Wooden Clock
products.description: Elegant and functional, this handcrafted wooden clock adds a touch of natural beauty to any room. Each piece is unique, showcasing the natural grain of the wood.

products.name: Personalized Photo Frame
products.description: Preserve your cherished memories in style with this customizable photo frame. Add names, dates, or a special message to make it truly unique.

products.name: Abstract Sculpture
products.description: A stunning 3D-printed abstract sculpture that serves as a conversation starter in any modern interior. Each piece is a unique work of art.

products.name: Customized Leather Wallet
products.description: A sleek and durable leather wallet that can be personalized with your initials or a short message. Combines style with functionality.
